RecordAggregationObjectFilter.name: RecordAggregationObjectFilter
RecordAggregationObjectFilter.description: Represents a filter that is applied to the records of an object in the record aggregation join sequence.

AssociatedObjectField.description: API name of the associated object's field whose value is used to filter the object's records. The associated object is specified in the record aggregation object.

Operator.description: Operator used in the filter expression.

RecordAggregationObjectId.description: The record aggregation object with which this record aggregation object filter is associated.

SequenceNumber.description: Sequence number of this record aggregation object filter.

Value.description: Reference value with which the designated field's values are compared when the filter is applied on the associated object's records.
